price: Àwọn tó bá sì ṣàì gbàgbọ́, tí wọ́n pe àwọn āyah Wa ní irọ́, àwọn wọ̀nyẹn ni èrò inú Iná. Olùṣegbére ni wọ́n nínú rẹ̀.”
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَكَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلنَّارِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū wakadhabū biāyātinā ulāika aṣḥābu al-nāri hum fīhā khālidūna
